story_27_61000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Don’t let your guard down yet. We still haven’t
gotten Hoopa back!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Hmph. So this is what it’s like to battle together
and put your trust in others.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_0600_10: It might...not be so bad after all.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Y-young master! Did you just say what I think
you said?
story_27_61000/2401_1001_0800_10: N-never mind! Let’s hurry and get Hoopa back!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_0900_10: There’s no need for you to come to us!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_1000_10: You! You’re that guy from before!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_1300_10: So is he, like, the boss or what?
story_27_61000/2401_1001_1400_10:
We took care of everyone out here! This is as
far as you go!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Don’t be ridiculous! This is the largest Team Break
hideout of them all! There’s a lot more where they
came from.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Think about what might happen to your precious
buddy here if you try to hurt me, hmm?
story_27_61000/2401_1001_1900_10: Wahaha! It looks like this is as far as YOU go!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Hmph. If you can’t move, just listen to what I’m
about to say.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_2600_10:
You really saved me! And there’s nothing I hate
more than owing someone a debt!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_2800_10:
When I think about it...this is the second time
you’ve saved me.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_2900_10:
If I had never met you that first night you
showed up...
story_27_61000/2401_1001_3100_10:
I probably would’ve been crushed by my own
loneliness and left completely broken.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_3200_10: To think that you’ve saved me a second time...
story_27_61000/2401_1001_3300_10: I... I hate to say it, but...
story_27_61000/2401_1001_3900_10:
Friends?! Are you kidding me? That’s the last
word I’d expect to come out of your mouth!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_4000_10:
But if you’re friends, you’ll have to do your part
to protect each other, won’t you? Come here
quietly so I don’t have to hurt anyone!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_4800_10:
What a troublesome plan...making just one of us
act separately to save Hoopa...
story_27_61000/2401_1001_4900_10: But I’m glad it worked out.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_5000_10:
Of course. I’m the one who decided what to do,
and my plans are always flawless—
story_27_61000/2401_1001_5100_10:
Argh! How dare you! Stop being so active! Go
back to how you were earlier!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_5200_10: Heh. You really are a troublesome Pokémon.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_5300_10: It’s not over yet! I-I’m still way ahead of you!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_5500_10:
With a group this big, there’s no way we’ll lose!
We’re taking you down once and for all, Lear!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_5600_10: What a stubborn bunch of riffraff. Come, then!
story_27_61000/2401_1001_5900_10:
Up until now, it wouldn’t glow, no matter
what we did...
story_27_61000/2401_1001_6000_10: This glow... I saw it the first time we met, too...
story_27_61000/2401_1001_6100_10:
Which means...you and I are a sync pair? Of all
the annoying things in the world, this surpasses
them all. It’s laughable.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_6200_10:
But...this guy in front of us is even
more annoying.
story_27_61000/2401_1001_6300_10:
Let’s take him down, Hoopa! Let’s show them
our power...
story_27_61000/2401_1001_6400_10: Our power as a sync pair!
